hero.name: Daniel Dev
hero.title: Full Stack Engineer
hero.description: I craft scalable, high-performance web applications with a focus on modern aesthetics and user experience.

about.bio: With over 5 years of experience in the software industry, I specialize in building robust React applications and scalable Node.js backends. I'm passionate about clean code, open source, and innovative UI design.

experience.description: Led the migration of a legacy monolithic app to a micro-frontend architecture using React and Webpack Module Federation.
Developed and maintained multiple client-facing applications. Optimized database queries improving load times by 40%.

projects.title: Neon Dashboard
projects.description: A futuristic data visualization dashboard using D3.js and React with real-time websocket data feeds.

projects.title: E-Commerce AI
projects.description: An AI-powered recommendation engine for e-commerce platforms using Python and TensorFlow.

projects.title: Social Graph
projects.description: A graph-based social network analyzer that helps users visualize their connection clusters.
